info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 9:41PM CDT until July 21 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL MARION AND NORTHERN LAMAR COUNTIES... At 941 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Hamilton to near Detroit, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Sulligent, Guin, Detroit, Beaverton, Weston, Crews, Henson Springs, Pearces Mill, Rankin Fite Airport, Byrd, Pine Springs, Marion County Public Lake and Pikeville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
